author: emiglior
body:
#### PR description:

This PR completes the decommissioning of phase2 Tracker geometries T17, T19 and T20 which were introduced after the phase2 Tracker TDR but now are abandoned.

Specifically it removes all the geometries featuring thin sensors in the OuterTracker except the T15/2026D49 geometry which is still of interest for the HLT TDR.

The first round of clean-up was done in PR #30512 (see also the discussion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/30512#issuecomment-692244829 - apparently nobody complains about removing T17, T19, T20).

#### PR validation:

The PR  has been validated running w/f 23234.0 23434.999 28234.0  and checking that the w/f numbers for the D49, D53, D63, D64, D65, D66 CMS geometries were not affected by the change.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport

@ghugo83 @duartej @skinnari @mmusich @tsusa
title: Removal of phase2 Tracker geometries T17, T19, T20
